0.1.name: wordpress/mingle-facebook-auto-connectory
0.1.description:
Mingle WP-FB AutoConnect Widget

This widget works in conjunction with the WP-FB AutoConnect Plugin to add the facebook login to Mingle's login widget (this would take place of your standard Mingle Login Widget).

Upload and activate. Under Appearance - Widget find the Mingle-FB Connector Drag into place where you want it to appear.

YOU MUST INSTALL THE WP-FB AutoConnect for this widget to work from http://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/wp-fb-autoconnect/

Visit http://icomnow.com for great friends and support and our iStore @http://istore.icomnow.com for great plugins and mods.

We are always available for questions and support for Worpdress, Mingle, and complete facebook integration.
